```{r}
s = 1:length(t)
t = c(3.49, 3.07, 3.58, 1.13, 1.81, 2.37, 2.25, 3.32, 3.61, 4.15, 3.97, 3.28, 2.51, 2.87, 3.23, 2.36, 3.61)
pie = data.frame(
  s = s, t = t
)
```


```{r}
po = lm(t ~ s, data = pie)
summary(po)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = pie, aes(x = s, y = t)) + geom_point()
```
